title: Classic Spaghetti Bolognese
instructions: 1. Boil water and cook spaghetti. 2. In a pan, brown ground beef with onions and garlic. 3. Add tomato sauce and simmer. 4. Serve over cooked spaghetti.
ingredients: Spaghetti, Ground beef, Onion, Garlic, Tomato sauce, Salt, Pepper

title: Chicken Alfredo Pasta
instructions: 1. Cook pasta according to package instructions. 2. Sauté chicken until cooked. 3. Add cream, parmesan, and cooked pasta. 4. Stir and serve.
ingredients: Pasta, Chicken breast, Cream, Parmesan cheese, Butter, Salt, Pepper

title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
instructions: 1. Heat oil in a pan. 2. Add mixed vegetables and stir-fry. 3. Season with soy sauce and serve.
ingredients: Mixed vegetables (bell peppers, broccoli, carrots, mushrooms), Soy sauce, Oil

title: Creamy Mushroom Risotto
instructions: 1. Sauté onions and mushrooms. 2. Add rice and stir. 3. Gradually add broth while stirring until rice is creamy and cooked.
ingredients: Arborio rice, Mushrooms, Onion, Chicken broth, Parmesan cheese, Butter, White wine

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions: 1. Cream butter and sugar. 2. Add eggs and vanilla. 3. Mix in flour, baking soda, and chocolate chips. 4. Bake until golden.
ingredients: Butter, Sugar, Eggs, Vanilla extract, Flour, Baking soda, Chocolate chips

title: Fresh Fruit Salad
instructions: 1. Chop assorted fruits. 2. Combine in a bowl. 3. Optional: add honey or lime juice for extra flavor.
ingredients: Assorted fruits (strawberries, kiwi, pineapple, grapes, mango), Honey (optional), Lime juice (optional)

title: Beef and Broccoli Stir-Fry
instructions: 1. Marinate beef in soy sauce and garlic. 2. Sauté beef until browned. 3. Add broccoli and stir-fry until tender.
ingredients: Beef sirloin, Broccoli, Soy sauce, Garlic, Oil, Cornstarch, Rice vinegar
